text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump SHOW US HOW MANY PPL PER CAPITA HAVE BEEN TESTED By 03.31.20 u said we wud have 27m ppl tested so y is the number of ppl tested only 4million???? A MERE 2% OF OUR CITIZENS & u seriously want 2 me 2 trust u that it is safe to go to work? Let's put u in a room of COVID19 patients
